title: Tech Mahindra launches TechMVerse to drive commerce in the Metaverse - Economic Times
content:
1. Tech Mahindra launches TechMVerse to drive commerce in the Metaverse  Economic Times
  2. Tech Mahindra announces its entry into metaverse with the launch of TechMVerse  Mint
  3. Tech Mahindra unveils TechMVerse to drive commerce in the Metaverse  Express Computer
  4. Tech Mahindra forays into Metaverse  BusinessLine
  5. After Infosys, now Tech Mahindra launches its metaverse services  Analytics India Magazine
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: The company would build on its 5G and infrastructure capabilities to build this platform, in partnership with hyper-scalers and starutps.
